quest.name: A Dance with Snakes
journal: Kaizan is looking for a womanman of true grit.
objectives: Use large burlap sacks to capture weakened sea serpents.
Deliver the weakened sea serpents to Kaizan.

dialogue.name: KAIZAN
dialogue.text: Ha! You look to be a womanman of great strength and courage, besides! How would you like to do me a favor?

dialogue.name: KAIZAN
dialogue.text: To the west of Shoal Rock are sea serpents. I need for you to weaken three and bring them back to me in these sacks.

dialogue.name: KAIZAN
dialogue.text: You are a brave womanman─far braver than the spineless cowards what inhabit this island. To think they call themselves pirates when a little serpent venom is enough to scare them. Ha! What a sorry lot!

dialogue.name: KAIZAN
dialogue.text: To the west of Shoal Rock are some sea serpents. I need you to weaken three, put them in the burlap sacks I gave you, and deliver them to me.

dialogue.name: KAIZAN
dialogue.text: Have you brought me my sea serpents?

dialogue.name: KAIZAN
dialogue.text: Well, color me impressed! You actually managed to capture three! While that is the number I asked for, they are extremely vicious creatures, and I expected you would only be able to return with one.

dialogue.name: KAIZAN
dialogue.text: I am also glad to see you also took care not to kill them. Sea serpent steak is incredibly tasty but only if prepared fresh.

dialogue.name: KAIZAN
dialogue.text: Before I get to grilling these buggers, however, I must milk them for their venom. We use it to spike the drinks of Confederate traitors.

dialogue.name: KAIZAN
dialogue.text: Nine out of ten times they will die, but the lucky survivors─like me─are given the chance to redeem themselves.
